mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID boardId, TITLE title, CONTENTS contents, FILE_NAME fileName, MEMBER_EMAIL memberEmail, CREATED_AT createdAt, UPDATED_AT updatedAt FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{fileName}, #{memberEmail}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
